broadwick.statistics.distributions

Class MultivariateNormalDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.statistics.distributions.MultivariateNormalDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContinuousMultivariateDistribution

    public class MultivariateNormalDistribution
extends Object
implements ContinuousMultivariateDistribution
    Sample from a Multivariate Normal (Gaussian) Distribution, a generalization of the one-dimensional (univariate) normal distribution to higher dimensions. This is a simple wrapper class for the Apache Commons Math multivariate normal library.

    References:

    • Multivariatenormal Distribution
